approval.approvedMessage: Thank you for confirming youth service membership.
approval.approverInfoText: Guardian may be contacted concerning the child.
approval.approveTerms: I have read <0>file description</0> and  city's <1>data protection principles</1>. I can be contacted via address I have given.
approval.formExplanationText_1: has sent a membership application for the City of Helsinki’s Youth Services for your approval. The membership is free of charge. If you approve the application,
approval.formExplanationText_2: may visit Youth Centres and enjoy fun benefits. If the information is incorrect, ask the young person to change it and send a new verification message to you.
approval.name: Name
approval.photoUsageApprovedText: Giving permission to use photos of my child for Helsinki internal and external media purposes.
approval.title: Please approve membership

confirmSendingProfile.helpText: Your membership application has been sent to
confirmSendingProfile.sendAgainHelpText: Approval email has been re-sent to
confirmSendingProfile.title: The application has been sent to your guardian for approval!

login.findNearestService: Find the nearest youth centre on the service map
login.helpText: Jässäri gives you access to the Youth Services’ activities. With Jässäri membership, you can participate in fun activities, hang out at Youth Centres, join hobby groups, courses and camps, apply for project subsidies or even produce your own event! The activities at Youth Centres are instructed by trained youth workers.
login.helpTextUnderAge: Unfortunately, you need to be at least 13 years old to get a digital Jässäri. You can download an application form from here.
login.linkForMembersText: Do you have membership? Log in
login.title: Get your Jässäri!

membershipDetails.photoUsageExplanation: Pictures of my child can be taken and used for internal and external communications in the City of Helsinki
membershipDetails.title: Own information

notification.defaultErrorText: Something went wrong. Try again after a while.

registration.ageRestriction: Only 8-25 years old can create youth profile.
registration.approverInfoOver18Text: For members over 18, we don't require providing custodian contact information. If for any reason you wish us to be able to contact them, you can add the information here.
registration.approverInfoText: A confirmation request concerning your membership will be sent to this address, and your guardian must verify the information and approve your membership.
registration.approveTerms: I have read <0>file description</0> and  city's <1>data protection principles</1>. I can be contacted via address I have given.
registration.confirmSend: Accept the terms and send the application
registration.membershipInfoText: Membership is free and does not require anything of you, but you do need a membership to be able to participate in activities at Youth Centres. We will not disclose your information to third parties. You have the right to check and remove the information we have stored concerning you. Please remember that intoxicants are not allowed at Youth Centre activities.
registration.photoUsageApprovedText: I can be photographed and photos can be used in internal and external communications in the City of Helsinki.
registration.processInfoText: A data verification request will be sent to the parent and once they have reviewed and approved the information, your membership will take effect.
registration.title: Please fill in your information
